title: The Cuomos Got Worse | Guests: Janice Dean & Jedediah Bila | 12/13/21
description:
Tornadoes devastated multiple states. Glenn and Stu discuss Chris Cuomo’s latest scandals, including allegedly insulting Fox News’s Janice Dean and his CNN producer's sexual assault allegation against a young girl. Fox News’ Janice Dean joins to discuss Chris Cuomo, his alleged insulting texts toward her, and her fight against the Cuomo family. Bill O’Reilly joins to discuss his tour with Donald Trump. Glenn previews his sit-down interview with President Trump. Glenn and Stu discuss the CBS interview with Jill Biden discussing Biden’s plummeting approval rating. Author Jedediah Bila joins to discuss the downfall of New York post-COVID.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
